title: Смелое авокадо и ночные лампы
storyContent: {"title":"Смелое авокадо и ночные лампы","pages":[{"text":"Это авокадо игрушка. Он любил играть ночью.","imagePrompt":"Fantasy scene with a cute avocado-shaped toy, eyes big with excitement, short green arms and legs, and wearing a tiny purple cape. It's evening, and the toy is sitting on a soft, fluffy pillow in a cozy room filled with twinkling fairy lights."},{"text":"Однажды лампы погасли. Что случилось?","imagePrompt":"The same avocado toy with a puzzled expression, standing beside an array of colorful, tiny lamps which are suddenly dim. The room looks magical with little sparkles floating in the air."},{"text":"Авокадо игрушка захотел помочь. ‘Я найду свет,’ сказал он.","imagePrompt":"Our avocado toy in the purple cape stepping bravely towards a shadowy door, a gentle glow from its tiny lantern lighting the path, while magical sparkles hover nearby."},{"text":"Он шагал вперёд. Ночь была тёмной, но не страшной.","imagePrompt":"The avocado toy walking through a beautifully twinkling hallway, lit softly by floating magical lamps. It looks determined and brave, with a tiny gleam in his eye."},{"text":"Он встретил светлячка. ‘Я помогу!’ сказал светлячок.","imagePrompt":"The avocado toy cheerfully meeting a glowing firefly, its wings shimmering with light. They are nose-to-nose, with whimsical sparkling trails around them."},{"text":"Они вместе шли, свет становился ярче.","imagePrompt":"The avocado toy and the firefly side by side, their lights shining brighter together, illuminating a softly glowing path surrounded by magical flowers."},{"text":"Ночной дух сказал: ‘Смелость ваша велика!’","imagePrompt":"A mystical night spirit, shimmering like moonlight, standing gracefully, speaking to the avocado toy and the firefly with an approving smile. The atmosphere is enchanting with a moonlit glow."},{"text":"Лампы зажглись снова. Авокадо игрушка счастлив!","imagePrompt":"Magical scene where all the magical lamps light up brightly as the avocado toy and the firefly watch in joy. The room is filled with a warm, inviting glow."},{"text":"Все плясали вместе. ‘Я сделал это!’ думал авокадо.","imagePrompt":"Celebratory scene of the avocado toy, the firefly, and the night spirit all joyfully dancing under the glimmering lights, surrounded by playful sparkles."},{"text":"Смелое сердце победило. Смелость приносит свет.","imagePrompt":"The avocado toy proudly standing in the center, smiling and holding hands with the firefly and night spirit. The background is a glowing canopy of twinkling lights."}],"moral":"Смелость приносит свет в тёмные времена и друзей рядом."}
